transport.question: I go on the road and take you places. I have wheels and a steering wheel. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 You might sing songs in me!
👪 I can carry your whole family.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I can fly you to a different country!
💺 You sit in seats while I'm flying.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can be very long. I pick up and drop off people at stations. What am I?

hints.text: 🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I float on water and can take you across the sea. What am I?
I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You need to balance on me.
🧑‍🦽 Some people use me for exercise
🔔 I usually have a bell to ring!

transport.question: I'm a big vehicle that carries many people around town. I stop at bus stops to let people on and off. What am I?

hints.text: 📍 You can find my route on a map
🎟️ You pay a fare to ride.

transport.question: I'm like a car, but you can hire me to take you where you want to go. What am I?

hints.text: 📍 I pick you up where you are.
🚕 I have a sign on top.

transport.question: I fly like a plane, but I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🏢 I can land on the top of buildings
🚑 You can see me helping people who are hurt.

transport.question: I carry heavy things. I'm big and strong. What am I?
I travel in space and take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍🚀 Astronauts wear special suits when they're inside me.
🪐 I travel far beyond the Earth.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?
I'm small and red, with black spots. I bring good luck, they say! What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 Some people think I bring good luck.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food. I'm very small and work as a team. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am known for being strong!
🌱 I often carry bits of leaves.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass. I have strong legs and can jump high. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I am not a frog, but I can jump like one!

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then sleep in a cocoon, and wake up with wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs and many eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ Some people are afraid of me.

bug.question: I love to eat wood, sometimes houses. I'm small, white and live in big groups. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am like an ant, but I like wood.

bug.question: I can glow in the dark. I fly around at night. What am I?
I am a long bug that looks like a twig. I hide in trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can look like a branch.

bug.question: I live underwater when I'm young, and then I fly. I have big eyes and see all around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I start my life in water.
🐉 I am sometimes called a dragon.
